snippet: The change allows them to serve on government advisory boards if they are representing companies or groups and not acting on their own behalf.
abstract: Obama administration rolls back part of its ban on lobbyists serving in government, narrowing one of the president’s signature policies in the face of a legal challenge.
lead_paragraph: The change allows them to serve on government advisory boards if they are representing companies or groups and not acting on their own behalf.

headline.main: Obama Administration Loosens Ban on Lobbyists in Government
